item.title: Agile Development: Welcome Changing Requirements?
item.description: If you ever being in a team which practices agile software development, you might already heard about how a software development team “welcome chnging requirements”. While it sounds great, I personally think, if this statement is not properly explained, the impact will be negative on the development team side.
